attributes.action: Investigate Turkish childrens home before agreeing to the countries EU entry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having watched the Documentary on ITV tonight last evening, I feel moved to urge the PM to thoroughly investigate the situation in Turkish childrens homes which are appalling and in direct contravention of human rights andf the rights of children to receive proper and fitting care .This country wishes to join the EU , please help to ensure that it takes care of its own children before contemplating their entry.
